title: South Korea wants U.S. troops to stay
text:
South Korea wants U.S. troops to stay 10:37am BST - 01:26
South Korea clarifies that American troops should remain on the Korean Peninsula whether or not a peace treaty is signed with North Korea following historic inter-Korea talks. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
South Korea clarifies that American troops should remain on the Korean Peninsula whether or not a peace treaty is signed with North Korea following historic inter-Korea talks.
